description: This course provides the opportunity for students to apply their learned knowledge to a specific project & develop skills & expertise in particular areas of interest. Case study projects may include a ten day work placement with an industry partner, on or off campus.
prerequisites: Admission is by permission of the Museum Studies Course Director. Minimum requirements are #6 from Part A & Part B of the Master of Museum Sudies list, GPA of 5, and an approved program of work at a museum or gallery or collecting institution prior to course commencement.
restricted: Course cannot be taken in 1st semester of enrolment.
